GR14yamsr_pu:3: nāthāya nāthamunaye 'tra paratra cāpi nityaṃ yadīyacaraṇau śaraṇaṃ madīyam
GR14yamsr_pu:8: saṃdarśayan niramimīta purāṇaratnaṃ tasmai namo munivirāya parāśarāya ||
GR14yamsr_pu:10: mātā pitā yuvatayas tanayā vibhūtiḥ sarvaṃ yad eva niyamena madanvayānām |
GR14yamsr_pu:11: ādyasya naḥ kulapater vakulābhirāmaṃ śrīmat tadaṅghriyugalaṃ praṇamāmi mūrdhnā || YStr_5 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:12: yan mūrdhni me śrutiśirassu ca bhāti yasminn asmanmanorathapathaḥ sakalaḥ sameti |
GR14yamsr_pu:13: stoṣyāmi naḥ kuladhanaṃ kuladaivataṃ tat pādāravindam aravindavilocanasya
GR14yamsr_pu:14: tattvena yasya mahimārṇavaśīkarāṇuḥ śakyo na mātum api śarvapitāmahādyaiḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:15: kartuṃ tadīyamahimastutim udyatāya mahyaṃ namo 'stu kavaye nirapatrapāya || YStr_7 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:16: yad vā śramāvadhi yathāmati vāpy aśaktaḥ staumy evam eva khalu te 'pi sadā stuvantaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:17: vedāś catur mukhamukhāś ca; mahārṇavāntaḥ ko majjator aṇukulācalayor viśeṣaḥ ? || YStr_8 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:18: kiṃ caiṣa śaktyatiśayena na te 'nukampyaḥ stotāpi tu stutikṛtena
GR14yamsr_pu:20: tatra śramas tu sulabho mama mandabuddher ity udyamo 'yam ucito mama cābjanetra ! || YStr_9
GR14yamsr_pu:21: nāvekṣase tyadi tato bhuvanāny amūni nālaṃ prabho bhavitum eva kutaḥ pravṛttiḥ ? |
GR14yamsr_pu:22: evaṃ nisargasuhṛdi tvayi sarvajantâüḥ svāmin ! citram idam āśritavatsalatvam || YStr_10
GR14yamsr_pu:23: svābhāvikānavadhikātiśayeśitṛtvaṃ nārāyaṇa ! tvayi na mṛṣyati vaidikaḥ kaḥ ? |
GR14yamsr_pu:24: brahmā śivaḥ śatamakhaḥ paramasvarāḍ ity ete 'pi yasya mahimārṇavavipraṣas te || YStr_11
GR14yamsr_pu:25: kaś śrīḥ śriyaḥ ? paramasattvasamāśrayaḥ kaḥ ? kaḥ puṇḍarīkanayanaḥ ?
GR14yamsr_pu:29: ko 'nyaḥ prajāpaśupatī paripāti ? kasya pādodakena sa śivaḥ svaśirodhṛtena ? || YStr_13
GR14yamsr_pu:30: kasyodare haraviriñcamukhaḥ prapañcaḥ ? ko rakṣatīmam ? ajaniṣṭa ca kasya
GR14yamsr_pu:32: krāntvā nigīrya punar udgirati tvadanyaḥ kaḥ ? kena vaiṣa paravān iti śakyaśaṅkaḥ ? || YStr_14
GR14yamsr_pu:33: tvāṃ śīlarūpacaritaiḥ paramaprakṛṣṭasattvena sāttvikatayā prabalaiś ca śāstraiḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:34: prakhyātadaivaparamārthavidāṃ mataiś ca naivāsuraprakṛtayaḥ prabhavanti boddhum || YStr_15
GR14yamsr_pu:36: māyābalena bhavatāpi niguhyamānaṃ paśyanti kecid aniśaṃ tvadananyabhāvāḥ
GR14yamsr_pu:37: yad aṇḍam aṇḍāntaragocaraṃ ca yaddaśottarāṇy āvaraṇāni yāni ca |
GR14yamsr_pu:38: guṇāḥ pradhānaṃ puruṣaḥ paraṃ padaṃ parāt paraṃ brahma ca te vibhūtayaḥ ||
GR14yamsr_pu:39: vaśī vadānyo guṇavān ṛjuḥ śucir mṛdur dayālur madhuraḥ sthiraḥ samaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:40: kṛtī kṛtajñas tvam api svabhāvataḥ samastakalyāṇaguṇāmṛtodadhiḥ || YStr_18
GR14yamsr_pu:41: upary upary abjabhuvo 'pi pūruṣān prakalpya te ye śatam ity anukramāt |
GR14yamsr_pu:42: giras tvad ekaikaguṇāvdhīpsayā sadā sthitā nodyamato 'tiśerate || YStr_19
GR14yamsr_pu:44: bhavanti līlāvidhayaś ca vaidikās tvadīyagambhīramano'nusāriṇaḥ || YStr_20
GR14yamsr_pu:45: namo namo vāṅmanasātibhūmaye namo namo vāṅmanasaikabhūmaye |
GR14yamsr_pu:47: na dharmaniṣṭho 'smi, na cātmavedī, na bhaktimāṃs tvaccaraṇāravinde |
GR14yamsr_pu:48: akiñcano 'nanyagatiḥ śaraṇya ! tvatpādamūlaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye || YStr_22
GR14yamsr_pu:49: na ninditaṃ karma tad asti loke sahasraśo yan na mayā vyadhāyi |
GR14yamsr_pu:50: so 'haṃ vipākāvasare mukunda ! krandāmi sampraty agatis tavāgre || YStr_23
GR14yamsr_pu:51: nimajjato 'nanta ! bhavārṇavāntaś cirāya me kūlam ivāsi labdhaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:52: tvayāpi labdhaṃ bhagavann idānīm anuttamaṃ pātram idaṃ dayāyāḥ || YStr_24
GR14yamsr_pu:53: abhūtapūrvaṃ mama bhāvi kiṃ vā sarvaṃ sahe me sahajaṃ hi duḥkham |
GR14yamsr_pu:54: kiṃ tu tvadagre śaraṇāgatānāṃ parābhavo nātha ! na te 'nurūpaḥ || YStr_25
GR14yamsr_pu:55: nirāsakasyāpi na tāvad utsahe maheśa ! hātuṃ tava pādapaṅkajam |
GR14yamsr_pu:56: ruṣā nirasto 'pi śiśuḥ stanandhayo na jātu mātuś caraṇau jihāsati ||
GR14yamsr_pu:57: tavāmṛtasyandini pādakaṅkaje niveśitātmā katham anyad icchati |
GR14yamsr_pu:58: sthite 'ravinde makarandanirbhare madhuvrato nekṣurakaṃ hi vīkṣate ||
GR14yamsr_pu:59: tvadaṅghrim uddiśya kadāpi kenacid yathā tathā vāpi sakṛt kuto 'ñjaliḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:60: tadaiva muṣṇāty aśubhāby aśeṣataḥ śubhāni puṣṇāti na jātu hīyate ||
GR14yamsr_pu:61: udīrṇasaṃsāradavāśuśukṣaṇiṃ kṣaṇena nirvāpya parāṃ ca nirvṛtim |
GR14yamsr_pu:64: dhanaṃ madīyaṃ tava pādapaṅkajaṃ kadā nu sākṣātkaravāṇi cakṣuṣā ? ||
GR14yamsr_pu:69: cakāsataṃ jyākiṇakarkaśaiḥ śubhaiś caturbhir ājānuvilambhir bhuhaiḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:77: cakartha yasyā bhavanaṃ bhujāntaraṃ tava priyaṃ dhāma yadīyajanmabhūḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:78: jagatsamastaṃ yadapāṅgasaṃśrayaṃ yadartham ambhodhir amanthy abandhi ca ||
GR14yamsr_pu:80: guṇena rūpeṇa vilāsaceṣṭitais sadā tavaivocitayā tava śriyā || YStr_38 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:84: śarīrabhedais tava śeṣatāṃ gatair yathocitaṃ śṣa itīrite janaiḥ || YStr_40
GR14yamsr_pu:85: dāsas sakhā vāhanam āsanaṃ dhvajo yas te vitānaṃ vyajanaṃ trayīmayaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:86: upasthitaṃ tena puro garutmatā tvadaṅghrisammardakiṇāṅkaśobhanā || YStr_41
GR14yamsr_pu:88: priyeṇa senāpatinā nyavedi tattathānujānantam udāravīkṣanaiḥ || YStr_42 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:94: śriyaḥ śriyaṃ bhaktajanaikajīvitaṃ samartham āpatsakham arthikalpakam ||
GR14yamsr_pu:97: dhig aśucim avinītaṃ nirbhayaṃ mām alajjaṃ paramapuruṣa yo 'ham
GR14yamsr_pu:99: vidhśivasanakādyair dhyātum atyantadūraṃ tava parijanabhāvaṃ kāmaye kāmavṛttaḥ || YStr_47
GR14yamsr_pu:101: atagiṃ śaraṇāgataṃ hare kṛpayā kevalam ātmasātkuru || YStr_48 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:103: bhagavan bhavadurdine pathaḥ skhalitaṃ mām avalokayāciyuta || YStr_49 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:104: na mṛṣā paramārtham eva me śṛnu vijñāpanam ekam agrataḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:105: yadi me na dayiṣyase tato dayanīyas tava nātha durlabhaḥ || YStr_50 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:106: tad ahaṃ tvad ṛte na nāthavān mad ṛte tvaṃ dayanīyavān na ca |
GR14yamsr_pu:107: vidhinirmitam etam anvayaṃ bhagavān palaya mā sma jīhapaḥ || YStr_51 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:108: vapurādiṣu yo 'pi ko 'pi vā guṇato 'sāni yathātathāvidhaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:109: tad ayaṃ tava pādapadmayor aham adyaiva mayā samarpitaḥ || YStr_52 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:110: mama nātha yad asti yo 'smy ahaṃ sakalaṃ tad dhi tavaiva mādhava |
GR14yamsr_pu:111: niyatasvam iti prabuddhadhīr atha vā kiṃ nu samarpayāmi te || YStr_53 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:112: avabodhitavān imāṃ yathā mayi nityāṃ bhavadīyatāṃ svayam |
GR14yamsr_pu:113: kṛpayaivam ananyabhogyatāṃ bhagavan bhaktim api prayaccha me || YStr_54 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:114: tava dāsyasukhaikasaṅghināṃ bhavaneṣu astv api kīṭajanma me |
GR14yamsr_pu:115: itarāvasatheṣu mā sma bhūd api me janma caturmukhātmanā || YStr_55 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:117: mahātmabhir mām avalokyatāṃ naya kṣaṇe 'pi te yad viraho 'tidussahaḥ ||
GR14yamsr_pu:118: na dehaṃ na prāṇān na ca sukham aśeṣābhilaṣitaṃ na cātmānaṃ nānyat ki api tava śeṣatvavibhavāt
GR14yamsr_pu:119: bahirbhūtaṃ nātha kṣaṇam api sahe yātu śatadhā vināśaṃ tat satyaṃ madhumathana vijñāpanam idam || YStr_57 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:120: durantasyānāder apariharaṇīyasya mahato nihīnācāro 'haṃ nṛpaśur aśubhasyāspadam api /
GR14yamsr_pu:121_0: dayāsindho bandho niravadhikavātsalyajaladhe tava smāraṃ smāraṃ guṇagaṇam itīcchāmi gatabhīḥ anicchann apy evaṃ yadi punar
GR14yamsr_pu:122_0: tathāpītthaṃrūpaṃ vacanam avalambyāpi kṛpayā tvam evaivambhūtaṃ dharaṇidhara me śikṣaya manaḥ pitā tvaṃ mātā tvaṃ dayitatanayas
GR14yamsr_pu:122_1: tvaṃ priyasuhṛt tvam eva tvaṃ mitram gurur asi gatiś cāsi jagatām |
GR14yamsr_pu:123: tvadīyas tvadhbṛtyas tava parijanas tvadgatir ahaṃ prapannaś caivaṃ saty aham api tavaivāsmi hi bharaḥ || YStr_60 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:124: janitvāhaṃ vaṃśe mahati jagati khyaatayaśasāṃ śucīnāṃ yuktānāṃ guṇapuruṣatattvasthitividām
GR14yamsr_pu:125: nisargād eva tvaccaraṇakamalāikāntamanasām adho 'dhaḥ pāpātmā śaraṇada nimajjāmi tamasi amaryādaḥ kṣudraś calamatir asūyaprasavabhūḥ kṛtaghno durmānī smaraparavaśo vañcanaparaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:126: nṛśaṃsaḥ pāpiṣṭhaḥ katham aham ito duḥkhajaladher apārād uttīrṇas tava paricareyaṃ caraṇayoḥ raghuvara yad abhūs tvaṃ tādṛśo vāyasasya praṇata iti dayālur yac ca caidyasya kṛṣṇa |
GR14yamsr_pu:127: pratibhavam aparāddhur mugdha sāyujyado 'bhūr vada kim apadam āgas tasya te 'si kṣamāyāḥ nanu prapannas sakṛd eva nātha tavāhaṃ asmīti ca yācamānaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:128: tavānukampyas smartaḥ pratijñānāṃ madekavarjaṃ kim idaṃ vrataṃ te ||
